mapper.insert: insert into adminorrole (ar_id, role_id, admin_id, start_time, end_time) values (#{arId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
